nav.div: Robbinsdale Area Schools » Depts. » Marketing and Communications » What's New » Coronavirus Update 3/11/2020

div.img:
March 11, 2020
Dear Robbinsdale Area Schools families and staff,
As we value the health and wellbeing of our Robbinsdale Area Schools community, we feel it is important to personally share updates in response to the coronavirus (COVID-19).
The health and safety of our students, families and staff is our highest priority. As such, please continue to follow the guidelines previously shared on February 28, 2020 (click on 'Coronavirus' tab), which were informed by the Minnesota Department of Health (MDH). Each week, we have participated in conference calls with MDH to receive their most recent recommendations and updates.
Keeping our community informed and giving them the tools they need to keep themselves and their families safe is our highest priority. As a reminder, please consult the Steps to Prevent Illness provided by MDH and the Centers for Disease Control (CDC).
Thank you for your patience as we receive information from MDH and continue to monitor ongoing developments.
Sincerely,
Carlton D. Jenkins, Ph.D.
Superintendent
Robbinsdale Area Schools

div.li: 4148 Winnetka Ave. N., New Hope, MN 55427
